instruction: I'm looking for a fun space adventure movie for the whole family
output: If you're up for an epic space adventure with lots of heart and laughs, you gotta check out Lightyear! 🚀 Buzz and his crew will take you on a wild ride through the stars. Perfect for family movie night! 🌟
